section_title: Solvent abuse may indicate child in need of compulsory measures of care.
section_text: 1 In section 32(2) of the  Social Work (Scotland) Act 1968 (conditions which if satisfied indicate that a child may be in need of compulsory measures of care within the meaning of Part III of that Act), the following paragraph shall be inserted after paragraph (g): gg he has misused a volatile substance by deliberately inhaling, other than for medicinal purposes, that substance’s vapour; or
2 There shall be paid out of money provided by Parliament any increase attributable to this Act in the sums so payable under any other Act.
3 1 This Act may be cited as the Solvent Abuse (Scotland) Act 1983. 2 This Act shall come into force at the end of the period of two months beginning with the day on which it is passed.
